intro.description: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create an extension point to enable clients to customize the behavior of the Eclipse Browser view.

item.title: Create a new extension point
item.description: To create a new extension point, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: On the "Extension Points" page of the plug-in manifest editor, press the "Add..." button in the "All Extension Points" section to open the "New Extension Point" wizard.
Input "htmlBrowsers" into the "Extension Point ID" text box.
Input "HTML Browsers" into the "Extension Point Name" text box.
Press Finish. This will add a new extension point to the list and open its schema in the Extension Point Schema editor.

item.title: Save the file
item.description: Select "File > Save" from the main menu to save the file.
